com.romanostrechlis.rssnews

Class NodeDetailFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.romanostrechlis.rssnews.NodeDetailFragment

  • public class NodeDetailFragment
extends Fragment
    A fragment representing a single Node detail screen. This fragment is either contained in a NodeListActivity in two-pane mode (on tablets) or a NodeDetailActivity on handsets.
    authorcomment
